about_the_game:
Diagnose and treat your patients and take responsibility for life and death in an emergency room as a doctor. Medical Shift is a professional simulation in which you take responsibility as a doctor in the emergency room of a hospital.

You can experience the everyday challenges of emergency medicine in two different game modes (career and sandbox). The main task is the emergency care, diagnosis and treatment of patients. You accompany the patients from their arrival in the emergency room to successful first aid.

The game offers the highest possible authenticity. This is achieved, among other things, through a realistic environment, a realistic representation of medical procedures and specialist instruments, as well as through a credible simulation of the hospital staff. Medical Shift is being developed with the help of the Unreal Engine 5 and will initially be released for the PC.



Take on responsibility as a doctor in a German emergency room!

● Realistic depiction of the environment and medical equipment
● Dense atmosphere through simulation of the staff - doctors, medical staff and patients follow their own daily routines
Two game modes: Career and Sandbox:
● Career: Gain experience to unlock new rooms, equipment, medical conditions and outfits. Your goal? The white coat!
● Sandbox: Create your own shifts and achieve your personal goals.
● Perform emergency treatments (under time pressure) and save lives.
● Diagnose and treat your own patients
● Decide for yourself which of the possible diagnoses you want to get to the bottom of first.
● Diagnosis as a detective game: question and examine your patients, carry out tests and enter the results in the patient's file yourself.
● Perform interactive medical procedures that test your powers of deduction, skill or timing.
● Good mix of calm gameplay, interrupted from time to time by time-critical emergencies.
● Gameplay first: Make your own decisions and experience your own story.
● Create and play your own character
● Take a (coffee) break: There is also a lot to experience away from your duties as a doctor.

short_description: In "Medical Shift" you become a dedicated doctor in the emergency room, responsible for diagnosing, treating, and saving lives. This professional simulation offers an immersive experience of the challenges and rewards of working in a fast-paced medical environment.
